# autoglue_ssh_keys (Data Source)

Lists all SSH keys for the organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `keys` (Attributes List) All SSH keys visible to the organization. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--keys))

<a id="nestedatt--keys"></a>
### Nested Schema for `keys`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `fingerprint` (String) SSH key fingerprint.
- `id` (String) SSH key ID.
- `name` (String) SSH key name.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `public_key` (String) OpenSSH-formatted public key.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
